name: Rohit Gaddam
bio:
I'm Rohith, an undergraduate final-year student at Anurag University.

I started my journey as a web developer and slowly expanded my skills to Flutter and Django Full Stack Development.

But my interest grew in Front-end Development and Cloud Computing.

I've been the Google Developer Student Club Lead for the year 2023-2024.

The journey has been amazing throughout the year.

I also founded an Edtech startup, 'Newbie Learning.'

We grew to a 5000+ developer community within 2 months.

We started to take online workshops, webinars, and bootcamps to upskill our community.

Now I'm studying in this area to complement my skills with development.
